claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: A journal header from the Vaccine journal published by Elsevier, showing the title, publisher logo, and journal homepage URL. The image contains only the journal title and publisher information and does not support the claim by providing any data or statements about recombinant technology or immune response. Note: The image lacks any study data or related content; conclusions cannot be drawn from this header alone.
